cache_a15_rom_api_calls_asm.h File Reference

This file contains the function declarations for ASM APIs needed by the A15 ROM API calls. More...

Functions

uint32_t FW_setMReqDomainId (uint32_t inRegOffset, uint32_t inRegVal)
 This function sets a given value in the CONTROL_CORE_MREQDOMAIN_EXP1-5 registers. On GP Device, the Hypervisor address is given by the input parameter. On HS device, the function returns FAILED certificate. More...
 

Detailed Description

This file contains the function declarations for ASM APIs needed by the A15 ROM API calls.

Function Documentation

uint32_t FW_setMReqDomainId ( uint32_t  inRegOffset,
uint32_t  inRegVal 
)

This function sets a given value in the CONTROL_CORE_MREQDOMAIN_EXP1-5 registers. On GP Device, the Hypervisor address is given by the input parameter. On HS device, the function returns FAILED certificate.

Parameters
inRegOffset: Offset of the CONTROL_CORE_MREQDOMAIN_EXPn register
inRegValValue to write into the register
Returns
NO_ERROR if success, fail otherwise NOTE: This function calls ROM API to set mreqDomain ID.
